allow:
Bash(git -C "C:\\claude_projects\\deployment-manager" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: deployment manager for mebbert.com web apps

Centralizes deployment documentation and configuration for four
sibling projects \(taskschedule, sevenhabitslist, recipeshoppinglist,
tifootball\) hosted on a shared AWS EC2 instance.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C "C:\\claude_projects\\sevenhabitslist\\sevenhabitslist" add CLAUDE.md deploy.py logs.py restart.py status.py)

Bash(git -C "C:\\claude_projects\\deployment-manager" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update tifootball status to deployed and add gitignore entries

Mark tifootball as deployed, add *.jpg to .gitignore, update
Claude Code permission settings.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\claude_projects\\sevenhabitslist\\sevenhabitslist" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update SSH key paths from D:\\ to C:\\ drive

Update all deployment scripts and docs to use C:\\ paths. Add
auto-discovery of .pem files, scp fallback when rsync unavailable,
and replace emoji with plain text in output.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add centralized deployment scripts for all 4 apps

Python scripts using tarfile+scp+ssh to deploy, check status,
restart, and view logs for taskschedule, sevenhabitslist,
recipeshoppinglist, and tifootball.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\claude_projects\\tifootball" add server/index.js server/seed.js server/populate-nfl-schedule.js server/populate-random-schedule.js server/full-tournament.js server/silent-simulator.js)

Bash(git -C "C:\\claude_projects\\taskschedule" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Move database to data/ directory for deploy safety

Change DATABASE path from ''database.db'' to ''data/database.db'' so the
deploy clean step \(which preserves data/\) won''t delete it. Add
auto-creation of data/ directory in models.py.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\claude_projects\\tifootball" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Move database to data/ directory for deploy safety

Change all 6 server files to use ''../data/tifootball.db'' instead of
''db/tifootball.db'' so the deploy clean step \(which preserves data/\)
won''t delete the database during deployment.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\claude_projects\\rjbingo" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Move database to data/ directory and add requirements.txt

Standardize database path to data/bingo.db to match deployment
conventions. Add requirements.txt for server-side pip install.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\claude_projects\\deployment-manager" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add rjbingo as 5th deployed application

Add rjbingo config to config.py and update CLAUDE.md with project
details, port allocation, database location, and service commands.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C "C:\\claude_projects\\rjbingo" add templates/base.html templates/index.html templates/print.html templates/cards.html)

Bash(git -C "C:\\claude_projects\\rjbingo" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Rebrand from Dio Bingo to Ronnie James Bingo

Update browser title, page heading, print title, and bingo card
column headers \(D-I-O-!-! to B-I-N-G-O\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\claude_projects\\rjbingo" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Use Cinzel Decorative font and remove uppercase transform on heading

Replace all-caps text-transform with proper-case Cinzel Decorative
display font for a dramatic, gothic feel.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\claude_projects\\rjbingo" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Switch heading font from Cinzel Decorative to Metal Mania

Cinzel Decorative is a small-caps font so lowercase still displayed
as uppercase. Metal Mania has proper mixed case and fits the theme.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\claude_projects\\rjbingo" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Switch to Abril Fatface font with proper lowercase letters

Metal Mania was also a unicase font. Abril Fatface is a bold display
serif with clearly distinct lowercase letterforms.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\claude_projects\\rjbingo" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Rebrand from Dio Bingo to Ronnie James Bingo

Update browser titles, page heading, and bingo card column headers.
Use Abril Fatface display font for the heading with proper mixed case.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
